Job Description: Job Description     The Senior Software Developer will aid in planning and implementing complex software projects and timelines, providing reliable solutions to a variety of problems, using sound problemsolving techniques and ensuring security is considered by design. You will perform technical root cause analysis and outline corrective action for given problems    Your Role & Responsibilities:     Developing and coding review software to meet stakeholder needs.   Monitoring the quality and performance of applications.   Ensuring documentary evidence is maintained on all work for future reference.   Design and update databases where required.   Maintain software products to ensure strong functionality and optimisation.   Recommend improvements to existing software programs as necessary.   Mentoring and passing on your knowledge of technologies and best practices.    Liaising with project stakeholders and advising them on solutions.   Performing technical root cause analysis and outline corrective action for given problems.   Taking full ownership of assigned tasks, ensuring effective reporting while working towards efficient, internal customer satisfaction.   Developing their own capabilities and expertise to provide a high-quality service to the business.   Staying abreast of business updates, current industry trends, new technology, and changes and issues relating to secure development activities.        Qualifications      You are:     An innovative and creative full-stack development engineer with project leadership experience. You are highly organised and proactive and able to work against tight deadlines. We are looking for a problem solver with excellent attention to detail and ability to communicate effectively with colleagues, participants and external stakeholders. Working knowledge of Git source control
